first.title: Lovely friends
first.content: I really love all the animals in the world especially dogs. I am living with 10 years old loveliest friend named PORI. Love their mind and give precious memories to the people. How can I not love them? We are lucky to have world's treasures in our life.

second.title: Binge-watch
second.content: I am good at binge-watch started when I was young. When that time, it was an animation for the kids, but now it's Netflix! Love to watch movies and series. It's really nice to know about other countries cultures and learn their languages. I could not watch Netflix in these busy days, but I really hope I can enjoy again Netflix series on vacation.
second.alt: Interesting, In the blink of an eye,

third.title: Weekend
third.content: I think most people like this. For me, I love the weekend morning. If it's a sunny day, that's the best! Grabbing some coffee and time to relax my mind gives me to have comfortable feelings and release all the stress from the week. Cleaning my room and laundry time is also my favorite time to spend the weekend. I love staying at home with sunny on big windows.
